examples: What motivates people to carry out such attacks?
¿Qué motiva a la gente a llevar a cabo tales ataques?
He is motivated entirely by self-interest.
Está completamente motivado por el interés propio.
She's very good at motivating her students.
Ella es muy buena motivando a sus estudiantes.
His greatest quality is the way he motivates his team.
Su mayor cualidad es la forma en que motiva a su equipo.
